original: Amataṁ saṁyojaniyaṁ ganthaniyaṁ oghaniyaṁ yoganiyaṁ nīvaraṇiyaṁ parāmaṭṭhaṁ upādāniyaṁ saṅkilesiyanti?
analyzed: amatam sayojaniyam ganthaniyam oghaniyam yoganiyam nīvaraṇiyam parāmaṭṭham upādāniyam saṅkilesiyanti
nanu a matam a sayojaniyam a ganthaniyam

original: Hañci amataṁ asaṁyojaniyaṁ …pe… asaṅkilesiyaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci amatam asayojaniyam pe asaṅkilesiya no ca vata re vattabbe

original: Amataṁ rāgaṭṭhāniyaṁ rajaniyaṁ kamaniyaṁ madaniyaṁ bandhaniyaṁ mucchaniyanti?
analyzed: amatam rāgaṭṭhāniyam rajaniyam kamaniyam madaniyam bandhaniyam mucchaniyanti

original: nanu amataṁ na rāgaṭṭhāniyaṁ na rajaniyaṁ na kamaniyaṁ na madaniyaṁ na bandhaniyaṁ na mucchaniyanti?
analyzed: nanu amatam na rāgaṭṭhāniyam na rajaniyam na kamaniyam na madaniyam na bandhaniyam na mucchaniyanti

original: Hañci amataṁ na rāgaṭṭhāniyaṁ na rajaniyaṁ na kamaniyaṁ na madaniyaṁ na bandhaniyaṁ na mucchaniyaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci amatam na rāgaṭṭhāniyam na rajaniyam na kamaniyam na madaniyam na bandhaniyam na mucchaniya no ca vata re vattabbe
amatam dosa ṭhāniyam kopa ṭṭhāniyam paṭigha ṭṭhāniyanti

original: nanu amataṁ na dosaṭṭhāniyaṁ na kopaṭṭhāniyaṁ na paṭighaṭṭhāniyanti?
analyzed: nanu amatam na dosa ṭhāniyam na kopa ṭhāniyam na paṭigha ṭhāniyanti

original: Hañci amataṁ na dosaṭṭhāniyaṁ na kopaṭṭhāniyaṁ na paṭighaṭṭhāniyaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci amatam na dosa ṭhāniyam na kopa ṭhāniyam na paṭigha ṭhāniya no ca vata re vattabbe

original: Amataṁ mohaṭṭhāniyaṁ aññāṇakaraṇaṁ acakkhukaraṇaṁ paññānirodhiyaṁ vighātapakkhiyaṁ anibbānasaṁvattaniyanti?
analyzed: amatam moha ṭṭhāniyam aññāṇa karaṇam acakkhukaraṇam paññā nirodhiyam vighāta pakkhiyam anibbāna savattaniyanti

original: nanu amataṁ na mohaṭṭhāniyaṁ na aññāṇakaraṇaṁ na acakkhukaraṇaṁ paññābuddhiyaṁ avighātapakkhiyaṁ nibbānasaṁvattaniyanti?
analyzed: nanu amatam na moha ṭṭhāniyam na aññāṇa karaṇam na acakkhukaraṇam paññā buddhiyam avighāta pakkhiyam nibbāna savattaniyanti

original: Hañci amataṁ na mohaṭṭhāniyaṁ na aññāṇakaraṇaṁ …pe…
analyzed: hañci amatam na moha ṭṭhāniyam na aññāṇa karaṇam pe

original: nibbānasaṁvattaniyaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
Rūpaṁ ārabbha saṁyojanā uppajjanti, rūpaṁ saṁyojaniyaṁ ganthaniyaṁ …pe… saṅkilesiyanti?
analyzed: rūpam ārabbha sayojanāḥ uppajjanti rūpam sayojaniyam ganthaniyam pe saṅkilesiyanti

original: Amataṁ ārabbha saṁyojanā uppajjanti, amataṁ saṁyojaniyaṁ …pe… saṅkilesiyanti?
analyzed: amatam ārabbha sayojanāḥ uppajjanti amatam sayojaniyam pe saṅkilesiyanti

original: Rūpaṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, rūpaṁ rāgaṭṭhāniyaṁ rajaniyaṁ kamaniyaṁ madaniyaṁ bandhaniyaṁ mucchaniyanti?
analyzed: rūpam ārabbha rāgaḥ uppajjati rūpam rāgaṭṭhāniyam rajaniyam kamaniyam madaniyam bandhaniyam mucchaniyanti

original: Amataṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, amataṁ rāgaṭṭhāniyaṁ …pe… mucchaniyanti?
analyzed: amatam ārabbha rāgaḥ uppajjati amatam rāgaṭṭhāniyam pe mucchaniyanti

original: Rūpaṁ ārabbha doso uppajjati, rūpaṁ dosaṭṭhāniyaṁ kopaṭṭhāniyaṁ paṭighaṭṭhāniyanti?
analyzed: rūpam ārabbha dosaḥ uppajjati rūpam dosa ṭṭhāniyam kopa ṭṭhāniyam paṭigha ṭṭhāniyanti

original: Amataṁ ārabbha doso uppajjati, amataṁ dosaṭṭhāniyaṁ kopaṭṭhāniyaṁ paṭighaṭṭhāniyanti?
analyzed: amatam ārabbha dosaḥ uppajjati amatam dosa ṭṭhāniyam kopa ṭṭhāniyam paṭigha ṭṭhāniyanti

original: Rūpaṁ ārabbha moho uppajjati, rūpaṁ mohaṭṭhāniyaṁ aññāṇakaraṇaṁ …pe… anibbānasaṁvattaniyanti?
analyzed: rūpam ārabbha mohaḥ uppajjati rūpam moha ṭṭhāniyam aññāṇa karaṇam pe anibbāna savattaniyanti

original: Amataṁ ārabbha moho uppajjati, amataṁ mohaṭṭhāniyaṁ aññāṇakaraṇaṁ …pe… anibbānasaṁvattaniyanti?
analyzed: amatam ārabbha mohaḥ uppajjati amatam moha ṭṭhāniyam aññāṇa karaṇam pe anibbāna savattaniyanti

original: Amataṁ ārabbha saṁyojanā uppajjanti, amataṁ asaṁyojaniyaṁ aganthaniyaṁ anoghaniyaṁ ayoganiyaṁ anīvaraṇiyaṁ aparāmaṭṭhaṁ anupādāniyaṁ asaṅkilesiyanti?
analyzed: amatam ārabbha sayojanāḥ uppajjanti amatam a sayojaniyam a ganthaniyam anoghaniyam ayoganiyam anīvaraṇiyam a parāmaṭṭham an upādāniyam a saṅkilesiyanti

original: Rūpaṁ ārabbha saṁyojanā uppajjanti, rūpaṁ asaṁyojaniyaṁ aganthaniyaṁ …pe… asaṅkilesiyanti?
analyzed: rūpam ārabbha sayojanāḥ uppajjanti rūpam a sayojaniyam a ganthaniyam pe a saṅkilesiyanti

original: Amataṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, amataṁ na rāgaṭṭhāniyaṁ na rajaniyaṁ na kamaniyaṁ na madaniyaṁ na bandhaniyaṁ na mucchaniyanti?
analyzed: amatam ārabbha rāgaḥ uppajjati amatam na rāgaṭṭhāniyam na rajaniyam na kamaniyam na madaniyam na bandhaniyam na mucchaniyanti

original: Rūpaṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, rūpaṁ na rāgaṭṭhāniyaṁ …pe…
analyzed: rūpam ārabbha rāgaḥ uppajjati rūpam na rāga ṭṭhāniyam pe

original: Amataṁ ārabbha doso uppajjati, amataṁ na dosaṭṭhāniyaṁ na kopaṭṭhāniyaṁ na paṭighaṭṭhāniyanti?
analyzed: amatam ārabbha dosaḥ uppajjati amatam na dosa ṭṭhāniyam na kopa ṭṭhāniyam na paṭigha ṭṭhāniyanti

original: Rūpaṁ ārabbha doso uppajjati, rūpaṁ na dosaṭṭhāniyaṁ na kopaṭṭhāniyaṁ na paṭighaṭṭhāniyanti?
analyzed: rūpam ārabbha dosaḥ uppajjati rūpam na dosa ṭṭhāniyam na kopa ṭṭhāniyam na paṭigha ṭṭhāniyanti

original: Amataṁ ārabbha moho uppajjati, amataṁ na mohaṭṭhāniyaṁ na aññāṇakaraṇaṁ …pe… nibbānasaṁvattaniyanti?
analyzed: amatam ārabbha mohaḥ uppajjati amatam na moha ṭṭhāniyam na aññāṇa karaṇam pe nibbāna savattaniyanti

original: Rūpaṁ ārabbha moho uppajjati, rūpaṁ na mohaṭṭhāniyaṁ na aññāṇakaraṇaṁ …pe… nibbānasaṁvattaniyanti?
analyzed: rūpam ārabbha mohaḥ uppajjati rūpam na moha ṭṭhāniyam na aññāṇa karaṇam pe nibbāna savattaniyanti

original: “nibbānaṁ nibbānato sañjānāti, nibbānaṁ nibbānato sañjānitvā nibbānaṁ maññati, nibbānasmiṁ maññati, nibbānato maññati, nibbānaṁ meti maññati, nibbānaṁ abhinandatī”ti.
analyzed: nibbānam nibbānataḥ sañjānāti nibbānam nibbānataḥ sañjānitvā nibbānam maññati nibbānasmin maññati nibbānataḥ maññati nibbānam mā iti maññati nibbānam abhinandati iti
